The photo was published on Facebook on N: 2019, and has been shared more than 1,100 times.
The caption of the post translates to En: You will get to know all the hidden truth behind the JNU protest if you look at this poster carefully. If they are protesting against fee hike then why this placard against RSS."
The photo shows a placard that reads: Down with RSS: SFI," referring to the Student Federation of India, the student wing of the Communist Party of India - Marxist (CPI-M).
A reverse image search on Google found t: 2016, during a student protest in New Delhi against the RSS following the suicide of a university student in Hyderabad.
